website_summaries.verdict: Top-notch photos and easy operation are offset by a big, clumsy design and expensive prints.
pros: PictBridge, ImageLink, Windows, and Macintosh compatible

customer_reviews.title: More Gimmick Than Tool
customer_reviews.text: We thought it would be cool to have a widget that both downloaded our photos to the computer and printed high-quality prints. Turns out we almost never use the printer... which has been annoyingly glitchy since we first set it up and tried it out. Recommend that owners of Kodaks stay with the plain vanilla dock included with their camera, and acquire one of the inexpensive, widely available multifunction photo-printers for their computer setup. One of those will print your documents as well as your photos, and at the moment they are dirt cheap too.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: great service. arrived on time and exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: great service. arrived on time and exactly as described. thank you. jim parks
customer_reviews.author: Jim Parks

customer_reviews.title: ehhh
customer_reviews.text: the person who sold this is very friendly extremely nice and very quick and prompt in their transactions i would do business with them anytime however i just wouldnt buy one of the printer docks evr again they discontinued them and they have no customer or technical support for them anymore and you cannot order new parts for them the only place you can get replacement parts is off of someone else who owns one already
customer_reviews.author: john Sigley

customer_reviews.title: Quick home made pictures
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item to have if you want certain photos immediately. The cost per picture is a little high, but it is all about speed and is useful for a picture or so that you want to give someone immediately without waiting to have them developed. I would have given it a higher rating, but sometimes I have to manually push the paper forward instead of it doing this automatically as it did when new several months ago. It works well with the Z group of Kodak cameras.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth W. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Choice for the Home
customer_reviews.text: I had read mixed reviews about this product and almost didn't purchase it. However, I took a chance and am thrilled that I did. I can now print any photo for about $.29 per copy and hand out copies to friends who want them, or leave them with relatives if I am away. As a devoted scrapbooker, I am very pleased with the high quality of the color and the prints. I highly recommend this item to complete your home photo shop.
customer_reviews.author: Katie M

customer_reviews.title: The Docking Port Camera is not compatible with my two ...
customer_reviews.text: The Docking Port Camera is not compatible with my two Kodak Cameras.Lack the two docking adapters that work with my two cameras Other consumers; make sure this Docking Port with work with your Model Kodak Easyshare Camera..
customer_reviews.author: Robert S Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: New (Used) Printer Dock
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying a "used" printer of any kind, let alone this printer "Dock". When it arrived, I found it difficult to believe that it had been used at all! It looks and prints like brand new and, in fact, better than the original one it replaced. I couldn't be more pleased or happy! I am not however, Pleased or happy with Kodak. They have discontinued the availability of supplies for this printer and when mine are gone, the printer becomes worthless. Too bad as I enjoyed using it.
customer_reviews.author: Oldfogy

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to load the printer cartridge and attach my camera to the dock. The pictures I printed had yellow lines. I followed all the suggestions in the guide and called Kodak customer service and the solution was to send it in to be serviced. So I never got to use the product. This was a birthday present so we were doubly disappointed. I recently purchased the G600 printer dock and was very pleased. The pictures are sharp and clear as getting them printed professionally.
customer_reviews.author: K. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: It worked for a while, but it finally quit. The prints started coming out with streaks and nothing I can adjust would get rid of it. Bought another one, it did the same thing. I went to Epson portable, and wished I had gone to it first.
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy for me
customer_reviews.text: It was too old could not use it with Window 7 sold it to someone who wanted it for a really old computer. I wish the seller had put it would not work with Windows 7 but it all worked out alright.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with Kodak Easyshare C1505 12 MP Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: This printer dock was a waste of time and money. I wanted to be able to sit the camera on the connector on the printer dock. The Kodak website implies you can do this. Nooooo. You have to connect it with the USB cable. Then it jams after about 10 prints.
customer_reviews.author: OrioleFan

customer_reviews.title: Kodak Easyshare Printer dock (series 3)
customer_reviews.text: i knew the product was not new, but it was advertised as working and in very good condition. When received, I put on parts from my old dock which included inserting the color cartridge. I then tried making a photo, and though the unit sounded as if it was working, it WOULD NOT pull in the photo paper. With that, I thought I would try to return dock, HOWEVER, the color cartridge would not eject and I UNFORTUNATELY, destroyed the dock getting the cartridge out!!! The moral of the story---tryling to save a few $ oftden does not pay!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Wacker

customer_reviews.title: bad product
customer_reviews.text: the pictures only half develop, the bottom half is the only part that develops, the top of the picture is all white,paper jams on every copy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Backup
customer_reviews.text: I have had one of this device for a long period which finally gave up. The one ordered was very good and I am able to use it with a variety of my Kodak Cameras. Good fast service and a quick response from the seller about a question I had.
customer_reviews.author: C. K. Reasor

customer_reviews.title: Just saw an old purchase in the review section
customer_reviews.text: I don't use any more I used it when traveling years ago technology moves so fast do they still make them ? just use a printer
customer_reviews.author: krwhome

customer_reviews.title: so the dock is useless, except for the camera charging on the top ...
customer_reviews.text: the opening for the cartridge on the printer dock was not wide enough for the cartridge to enter into the printer dock, so the dock is useless, except for the camera charging on the top of the dock
customer_reviews.author: william camirand

customer_reviews.title: Prints extremely fine quality prints that last a life time
customer_reviews.text: Prints extremely fine quality prints that last a life time. Only hope Kodak continues to make the paper and dye for it.
customer_reviews.author: franks

customer_reviews.title: Photo store quality in the comfort of your own home!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very easy to use product that provides the same quality prints as you would normally receive from a photo store. Great for anyone that doesn't want the hassle of hooking up to a computer to print out your photos. Also prints from various memory cards for even more options. Prints are quick and easy and at a very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Lazenby

customer_reviews.title: Kodak Easyshare
customer_reviews.text: The unit workes great. It replaced the original unit that failed.
customer_reviews.author: Packrat

customer_reviews.title: Also is worn out
customer_reviews.text: These printers develop an issue where only 1/3 to half of the photo prints. Seems the voltage distributing the image to the print rollers becomes too weak to fill the entire print, an Kodak has released NO fix. Am satisfied only $35 was invested and am not seeking reinbursement for shipment of this product. Seller should have trashed the product.
customer_reviews.author: trish

customer_reviews.title: A terrific product
customer_reviews.text: This is a must-have device for photo fans who like to have immediate prints of their digital masterpieces. Rather than deal with lengthy development procedures, this handy device presents the camera owner with snapshots ready to be inserted in the family album
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L. Canfield

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The person that sent it to me sent it in non-working condition. It wouldn't recognize the print cartridge.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Little wonder!
customer_reviews.text: The printer dock series 3 is a wonderful little device. It's so easy to use. It charges my camera, downloads my pics to my computer, and produces quick pics. My first one broke after several years. I purchased another one "used," and now I'm back in business. One of its best features is that most easy share cameras can access this machine with a simple change of an adapter plate. So if you update your easy share camera, you can still use the printer. Just wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Archer

customer_reviews.title: The dock seamed to be ok but the print did ...
customer_reviews.text: The dock seamed to be ok but the print did not . Only one side of the picture printed. I put a new color section in and tried again but only one side of print came out. That was the same problem with my old printer dock. Wayne
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Roll Williams

customer_reviews.title: Upset customer
customer_reviews.text: Does not feed the printer paper and when it finally picks it up, it stops printing and says paper jam, but there is no paper jam. Did not use it until prom night and was very upset with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great prints
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think that this printer would work as great as it does. Very happy with the ease of setup and operation. Could not have been easier.
customer_reviews.author: 1934 Hemi

customer_reviews.title: Kodak printer dock
customer_reviews.text: Order was received as promised in good condition. After receiving the docking station I tried it out and it worked fine. I ordered some more paper and ink for the printer and found that with the second ink cartridge I was getting some crazy lines on the paper. Not sure if it is because of the printer or the new ink at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wrong printer.
customer_reviews.text: Would not work with my camera. I gave up trying to find the right printer for my camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It finally started working like I had believed it would.
customer_reviews.author: Hold Still

customer_reviews.title: Quality photos, Easy to use, works every time
customer_reviews.text: The title says it all, I am well please with the printer dock. I have printed over 200 photos and it has worked without fail.
customer_reviews.author: KYDave

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: It did not work waste of my time I had to send it back
customer_reviews.author: Eric Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: problem
customer_reviews.text: it was listed as used but working. however when i recieved it the printer did not work properly. no problems getting a refund. the company was very professional. ive had one before and it worked great for about 4years but you cant buy them new anymore
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Easy Share
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacment, but was an upgrade from what I had. Kodak's easy share printer dock is an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Fred E. Schnoke

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad it was cheap
customer_reviews.text: The dock does not print pictures. I can use it to charge my camera. The same thing breaks on all of them. That's why they were discontinued. I'm glad it was cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Connie W. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Great for the work that I do,appraising Quilts
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these. As Kodak has stopped producing this type of picture processing I have bought back up for my picture tools.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: The printer only printer one half of the photo. ...
customer_reviews.text: The printer only printer one half of the photo. Alter research there is a broken part inside which I have to fix. I should have tried to find a new one to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D. Giancristoforo

customer_reviews.title: good return policy
customer_reviews.text: My other printer was hit by lightening and I didn't want to pay for a new one so ordered used. Very happy with the final unit. The first one I received was damaged in shipping and had to be returned. They were very good about giving return info and getting the new one to me. Would definitely use them again.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M. Mattes

customer_reviews.title: THIS ITEM WAS SUPPOSE TO HAVE NEVER BEEN OUT OF ...
customer_reviews.text: THIS ITEM WAS SUPPOSE TO HAVE NEVER BEEN OUT OF THE BOX. IT NEVER WORKED AND I GOT A REFUND! THANK-YOU AMAZON
customer_reviews.author: roger e anderson

customer_reviews.title: Can't get it to print the whole picture. Only ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't get it to print the whole picture. Only prints one-half of the sheet. Have tried to contact Kodak but not successful.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy I. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: We found the printer dock difficult, if not impossible, to find on store shelves. When our original printer quit working, we were wondering if our camera was now obsolete. Thank you, Amazon.com, for having items that are sometimes hard to find on store shelves! We are glad to have our camera printer!
customer_reviews.author: K. Treat

customer_reviews.title: Printer Dock
customer_reviews.text: The item prints ok. (1) It does not charge my camera when connected to the printer. (2) The dock was not shipped with an insert to mount the camera. I had to order an insert costing me $7.99.
customer_reviews.author: al horn

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Very poor engineering job by Kodak. The Dock has a very short life span before it breaks down and Kodak has no fix.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Nadolny

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked the printer just fine, but the camera was broken when i received the package.
customer_reviews.author: marsha

customer_reviews.title: Wife is happy
customer_reviews.text: The Easy Share Printer Dock is in excellent condition and was put to work immediately on receipt. Service and communications were also excellent. Will do it again on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: bruce947

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It did not work, and could not get the color cartrigde out
customer_reviews.author: Richard Royster

customer_reviews.title: dried up ink
customer_reviews.text: when it arrived we couldn't use it because the ink as dried up so i have no idea how well it works. now i have to search the internet to find ink for it.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: It Didn't Work! Started- up, but did not ...
customer_reviews.text: It Didn't Work ! Started- up ,but did not print! I am upset .
customer_reviews.author: Kenn Getz

customer_reviews.title: Love that Printer Dock
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this printer dock to go with my new Kodak camera and left for vacation the next day, taking the dock with me. Since we were in FL during a hurricane, I could play and printed out my vacation pictures. The pictures printed out clear and are now ready for scrapbooking!
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Bajus

customer_reviews.title: had one  and it died. thiis one is great
customer_reviews.text: these are hard to find but very usefull. take a pic and print it as quick as you wish. i'm 83 yrs. young and enjoy this feature system greatly. j meeks
customer_reviews.author: leslie james meeks

customer_reviews.title: great little printer
customer_reviews.text: Item work vey well, makes a little noise when printing but doesn't affect the product. Had one for years before mine broke
customer_reviews.author: patti page

customer_reviews.title: bad follow up quick shipment
customer_reviews.text: when the product didnt work with the home computer after the sale they did not even respond to an email trying to figure out what to do. the product was shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: G. Doran

customer_reviews.title: My first Kodak C503 dock printer Series 3 was bought ...
customer_reviews.text: My first Kodak C503 dock printer Series 3 was bought 24 Nov 2006 along with my C533 camera .. my printer ended it's life Nov 2016 and I wanted another because of the quality of pictures .. after buying another dock printer thru Amazon, I ran out of Kodak Xtralife paper .. then what .. back thru Amazon, I was able to obtain the photo paper I needed .. I am now back in biz .. be 90 yrs old this month [Nov] .. I'm on the road again ..
customer_reviews.author: Buddy C.

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the vendor I ordered this product from - ARNGMike. I never received it. I emailed ARNGMike and never heard back. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Disgruntled

customer_reviews.title: Performs well for the price
customer_reviews.text: I had been using the Kodak Printer Dock 6000. I see very little difference in the quality of picture, and features are basically the same. I don't regret buying it, but do wish I had a sharper picture.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This item only prints on one side! Selling your junk on Amazon is not fair for anyone! Repair or throw away!
customer_reviews.author: griselda rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: very bad transaction
customer_reviews.text: I PURCHASED THE PRINTER DOCK TRAY ONLY AND WHEN I RECIEVED IT IT WAS DAMAGED THE SELLER CHARGED ME 7.95 FOR SHIPPING AND IT COST 3.95 AND WAS VERY NASTY TO DEAL WITH. NEADLESS TO SAY I HAVE A BROKEN PRINTER TRAY AND I AM OUT 32 DOLLARS
customer_reviews.author: Katina M. Harrington

product_meta.title: Kodak Easyshare Printer Dock (Series 3) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From the Manufacturer With the Kodak EasyShare Printer Dock (Series 3), you can simply dock your Kodak EasyShare digital camera, press print, and create great-looking, borderless pictures at sizes up to 4 x 6 inches (10 x 15 centimeters). You can also transfer your pictures from camera to computer at the touch of a button.

 

 * Recharges your camera's batteries in 3.5 hours or less (caries by camera model) 
 * Fun ways to print with 4 selectable picture sizes (1-up: 4 x 6 inches, 2-up: 3 x 4 inches, 4-up: 2 x 3 inches, 9-up: 1.3 x 2 inches) 
 * Imagelink Print System compatible - print directly from Imagelink Print System compatible products

 Award-winning ease of use


 * Simply dock your camera and push a button to create beautiful pictures from your Kodak EasyShare Digital Camera 
 * Use the Kodak Printer Dock with or without a computer 
 * Transfer pictures from the camera to computer at the touch of a button 
 * Get back to shooting quickly--the Printer Dock recharges your Kodak Camera's battery in less than 3.5 hours (varies by camera model) 
 * Start printing and sharing right out of the box with the included Kodak Color Cartridge and Photo Paper Kit (10 prints)

 Expanded flexibility and printing options


 * Fun ways to print your pictures the way you want with 4 selectable sizes ranging from full 4 x 6-inch photos to 3 x 4-inch credit card size prints with borders to multiple 2 x 3-inch wallets to 1.3 x 2-inch mini photos 
 * PictBridge compatible so you can print directly from any PictBridge-enabled digital camera 
 * Print directly from most popular memory cards using the optional Kodak 8-in-1 Card Reader

 

Use with or without a computer
 * With a computer... Transfers your pictures from camera to computer with one touch of a button, so you're ready to start viewing, editing, printing or emailing your pictures 
 * Without a computer... Get great-looking prints with ease--you don't even need a computer 

 Compatible with Kodak EasyShare digital cameras 

 * Compatible with Kodak EasyShare-One and Z Model Digital Cameras and Kodak EasyShare Picture Viewer 
 * Kodak EasyShare CX/DX6000/7000 and LS600/700 Series Digital Cameras (Kodak Dock Adapter Kit D-26 required to enable compatibilty)
feature_bullets: Easy one-touch printing for real Kodak quality photos
Create durable, waterproof pictures that last a lifetime
Use with or without a computer
Compatible with Imagelink Print System and PictBridge-enabled digital cameras

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.8 out of 5 stars155 ratings2.8 out of 5 stars
